website_summaries.verdict: An ideal choice if you constantly find yourself trying to staple in hard-to-reach spaces.
pros: Good quality at a decent price
Design makes it easy to reach tight spots
Comes in a kit that includes extras such as staples, oil, and a case
cons: Some buyers say that the kit arrives missing items such as staples, and that the case is on the cheap side

customer_reviews.title: Better than my manual stapler.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for me. I already owned a good-quality manual stapler but needed the extra reach that the protruding tip provides. Used the stapler to re-upholster a motorcycle seat; a straightforward job but needs a stapler that can reach past various ridges/obstructions to get to the action. Very pleased with the final job, and the stapler that helped me get there.
customer_reviews.author: Martin E

customer_reviews.title: Poor stapler fails quickly
customer_reviews.text: I am rebuilding a large room so a regular manual stapler would not do the job. Electric staplers are not as good as this light weight pneumatic stapler. I am using this stapler to install insulation in the ceiling and walls of a 600 sq foot room with three sides of exterior walls. This stapler failed completely before completing one room stapling insulation. The piston began leaking and would not drive any staples even though I followed the lubrication instructions and air pressure setting completely. $38 for the staples is expensive since the tool is virtually worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Holt Davis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent inexpensive stapler
customer_reviews.text: I used this tool to reattach the seat cover to my motorcycle, after a mod to the underlying seat foam; that job would have been difficult at best without it. The tool worked very well, sending staples to tight locations that would not have been accessible to a manual stapler. The selection of staples provided assured that I had the correct type from the start (there are many types and sizes of staples to choose from, I could see that selection going wrong easily). I will be using this tool again on a household upholstery project; I was pleasantly surprised at the solid performance of this inexpensive tool.
customer_reviews.author: pberguy

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I put this thing through hell. I went through five 10,000 box Staples. I don't think it jammed up one time. I was using it to put up send aluminum style insulation 3/8 inch thick. Have used it on other insulation jobs works great. I've used anywhere from 1/4inch up to 1/2 inch staples have not had any issues. Have ran it on 120 lb compressors to 80 lb compressors have not had any issues is the real deal. You will not go wrong with purchasing this nice little carry case also.👍
customer_reviews.author: Wes simpson

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little air tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little air tool. It comes with a ton of staples and when I used it for my upholstery project it never misfired in over a thousand shots. I highly recommend this tool to anyone wanting an air stapler. I run my 5 gallon compressor at 90 psi with this tool.
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Berberette

customer_reviews.title: Great gun good price
customer_reviews.text: I am an artist and I stretch my own canvases and I do quite a few a day. I have stretched 16x20 inch 20 canvases so far and not one jam at all. I was sick and tired getting manual powershot staple gun jamming on me the all day long. I can't believe for many years put up with that junk. I highly recommend Pneumatic ones over manual. Also very easy on the hands too.
customer_reviews.author: Tamer Maximus

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for the money. I bought it to work on the seats of my Hayabusa. It worked very well. No jams or issues. I really liked that it came with the different sizes of staplers because I started using one size and ended using a bigger size because of my fabric thickness. I would buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: A great little air stapler
customer_reviews.text: This tool kicks butt! I’d been insulating my 26’x34’ garage with R30 kraft face insulation using a manual T50 stapler, going very slow, when I decided to buy this stapler and give it a try. Wow, what a time saver! The “bump” feature allows you to hold the trigger down and just touch the point you want to staple with the tip of the gun- boom- done! It was even driving 5/16 staples in the rafters with no problem. It’s also very efficient and doesn’t need a lot of air pressure to fire. Just a little light oil once in a while to keep things moving and you’re all set. What an awesome gun for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: CraigTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: What was I waiting for?!
customer_reviews.text: I got by using a heavy duty hand stapler for years because I couldn't justify the cost for such infrequent use. I recently decided to re-screen my porch and figured for $38 this was worth a shot. The stapler came quickly and included several boxes of staples, oil, and its own molded plastic case. I loaded the staples incorrectly at first but a quick scan of the instruction manual sorted that out. The performance was amazing. So glad I purchased this. Kicking myself for not buying one years ago. You will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: As I used this today to install a new cover to a motorcycle seat, I thought to myself, this is the best value purchase I have ever made on Amazon. It works perfectly. Never jammed once with at least 300 staples. Every staple penetrated properly with no issues at all. Unbelievable value with all the staples provided on top of the tool itself. If you need one of these, don't hesitate. On a side note I would imagine a very small compressor is more than enough for this. I was using 80PSI and my small compressor only cycled twice.
customer_reviews.author: gjones

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stapler, and it works wonderfully. I have put about 2500 staples through it thus far, putting chicken wire on a large pet pen area, and it has not once malfunctioned. I have my air compressor set at 100 psi and apply 2-3 drops of pneumatic oil in the air inlet about every third change of staples, as the instructions recommend. I am using the Arrow T50 9/16 inch 14mm staples into treated lumber, and the stapler shoots the staples in flush.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy H

customer_reviews.title: Not a P.O.S. tool
customer_reviews.text: Just ran about 500 staples through this stapler. Not ONE jam or issue. Worked perfectly. Am installing/hanging roll insulation and tired quickly of the manual stapler. Actually, my old hands ain't up to it. Tried an electric stapler that jammed EVERY time. Finally got this in the mail and hit the floor runnin'. Nothing out of the ordinary with this gun. Much akin to the nail and brad guns I've used in the past. Nothing new to learn. Anxious to try it out on upholstery projects. Am optimistic it will work fine. The bonus staple assortment is a big convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Slick

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly - See Test
customer_reviews.text: This staple gun is of really nice quality. I read the reviews and noticed there were a few complaints about breaking within very few staples being shot so I tested it right away. I shot 200 staples very quickly and there were no misfires and the staples were consistently seated all the way. Take a look at my test board which was 1/2" plywood. I shot 200 1/2" staples. The gun also has an unmentioned feature. You can hold the trigger down and tap the staple gun down on the nose to fire staples. Be careful with this feature because although useful it can be dangerous if you accidentally tap your hand. I am really pleased with this staple gun
customer_reviews.author: H. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: For chair upholstry you are better off with this staple gun
customer_reviews.text: My wife re-upholstered our dining chairs. She first started using an electric staple gun we already had around the house. While they seemed to work the effort was difficult and the results were just ok. I bought her this staple gun to use with the pancake style compressor we already had. What a difference. The air stapler has so much more power. Be sure to get the right staples (style, size) and you will be all set. Chair re-upholstry can be pricey to get done professionally (understandably so given the work involved). If you are up for the task, this stapler will more than pay for itself.
customer_reviews.author: The Moose

customer_reviews.title: A must have for re-upholstering
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for re-upholstering some wing back chairs. While I barely got to use it, my husband pretty much hogged it, it is very lightweight, I have small hands and found it easy to use, its small and compact so it fits well in tighter spaces. My husband was really impressed with it, he has several electric staplers but says this one was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley A

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for price
customer_reviews.text: Only problem I had was after about three loads of staples that it would not fire a staple and I disassembled the head to see if it was jammed and lost the compression spring and searched around and found it, then I lost it again and had to go to a hardware store to pick up a compression spring that I had to cut to size that work as a compression screw now it works beautifully. Parts seem to be unavailable for the stapler have her at the price I paid for it it’s a disposable item but some parts you may pick up locally as I did.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Scott Allen

customer_reviews.title: Cross Threaded Tail Cover and Air Plug
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in May of 2019 for a project and never used it. I finally had an opportunity to use it and could not snap the air line onto the air plug (no issues with the airline plug- tested it on other guns). To save time I removed an air plug off one of my other nailer and realized that as I was unscrewing the air plug from the SureBonder it was completely cross threaded and loaded with teflon tape. I assume that this must have been a return that was repaired and thrown back on the shelf then shipped back out. Very frustrating as I'm sure I cant return it now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I had only 1 negative. The air fitting was cross threaded into housing. Took a lot of force to remove as it tore out most of the threads. Thankfully I was able to run a tap in and had a couple threads to hang on to my matching air fitting. Otherwise, stapler works great. Wish I would have found this before getting electric stapler that cost more and works poorly. Hope you have better luck.
customer_reviews.author: A dad that tries

customer_reviews.title: Easy for girls to use. Heyyyyy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife who wanted to recover 6 breakfast room chairs. Did not want to use our old manual staple gun. Killed her hand. Got it delivered. Unboxed. Loaded with staples. Hooked up to compressor Bang. Perfect. She loved it! Covered all 6 chairs in 90 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: NickDanger

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this specifically for a project over the summer ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this specifically for a project over the summer, replacing the bunks on my boat trailer. I used this + stainless staples to carpet new bunks for the trailer. Note: you will need an air compressor (this is not electric). I used it with my Husky 8 gallon compressor. Attaching pictures of the case as it was not depicted when I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: cruz878

customer_reviews.title: A lot of bang of the buck
customer_reviews.text: Considering the price, I was really surprised at how well this stapler worked and continues to work. I use it with a 3.5 gallon 135psi (turned down to 90psi) pancake compressor. I mainly use it for attaching canvas to stretchers for art painting. But I also have use for it in attaching pieces to home-made frames in various wood varieties. The stapler feels small, making it great for maneuvering around stapling jobs. The adjustable pressure and variety of provided staples allow me to easily staple into different densities and thicknesses of wood. I have only had the best results with this, and I recommend it to anyone looking for an easy-to-use staple gun.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Allen

customer_reviews.title: Failed driver
customer_reviews.text: Product failed after one box of staples The driver broke internally and cannot be repaired their are no parts available. window closed for a return a few days before it failed. Not out a lot of money but not well made either.
customer_reviews.author: Jannarae

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my use
customer_reviews.text: Tried to use a manual stapler for doing some upholstery recovering work. That was a disaster! Bought this pneumatic stapler and all was well. The backer board was 1/2" 25 year old OSB that was very hard. Fired the 3/8" staples home every time. Setup was easy....put a few drops of tool oil in the air inlet, add staples, verify compressor PSI setting and away I went. So much faster than doing it manually and didn't have to break out a hammer to seat the staples. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: M Crowder

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a life saver
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a life saver. Y wife and I decided to make cushions for our outdoor bench. We bought foam, outdoor fabric and outdoor plywood- but I did not look forward to manually stapling a couple hundred staples ( ven though I work construction and have a couple good manual staplers) .....bought this and it worked PERFECT. We even decided to cover a couple more chairs since it was so easy.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stapler! Easy to use, Fun to use, made the project a breeze. It is lightweight and fits a woman’s hand, but staples well. I had been using an old manual stapler and could not sink the staples level with the board. This cut my project time (a headboard) probably in 1/4. I could have been even less than that, but I couldn’t stop myself from shooting more staples🥴.
customer_reviews.author: J. M.M.

customer_reviews.title: Pneumatic Stapler Kit
customer_reviews.text: This stapler is used to install seat covers on wheel wheelers and motorcycles with the heavy plastic trays. It comes with a good variety of different length staples and has ample power to drive the staples in all the way. I am sure I will find many more uses for this kit for more types of quick repairs needing staples. Easy to operate and works as stated. Fair price and good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Works Great at Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my wife to use for upholstering fur nature. She loves it. She uses it with a DeWalt pancake compressor. Easy to use, drives staples perfect and light weight. We had tried squeeze handles and a few different electrics but this is by far the best. Only used a little over a month but so far it easily deserves a five star rating
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Works out of the box. No problems so far.
customer_reviews.text: Works out of the box. No problems so far. Small projects so far but will be putting to use over the summer for large wire mesh. Only Dislike: The case/box that it comes in smells pretty bad - cheap/plastic off gassing.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great little stapler and you can buy the staples any where.
customer_reviews.text: This stapler works great. Never jammed and has plenty of power. I needed a stapler that would work for putting a new seat cover on a dirt bike seat. The seat has a plastic base which the staples have to penetrate. I tried several hand ones and an electric one. None of them would sink deep enough to make the seat cover tight. thus one worked every time. The fact the staple size is one of the most common sizes is a huge bonus. You can buy them anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Excellant stapler!
customer_reviews.text: Product worked as advertised. I had previously used an electric stapler but it didn't drive staples to the proper depth that my project required. The Surebonder was the perfect tool for my job and I just loved the various sizes of staples that were supplied with this pneumatic stapler. I would recommend the Surebonder stapler to anyone looking for a solid built tool and a nice case was included!
customer_reviews.author: JohnB

customer_reviews.title: No brainer for your projects.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in 2016 and never opened the box. I recently had a project to cover my pool equipment with a sun screen material attached to a wood frame. I remembered I had purchased this stapler and put it to work, using over 100 staples in the course of just a few minutes. Super smooth, easy operation and did not misfire and stuck the staples perfectly each time. This stapler is impressive and a great price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make the staples fly!
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. So not sure if the manufacturer thinks everyone uses the same air chuck as what they put on it but we all don't. When I removed the air hose adaptor to install the T-type, who ever installed the original one did not know how threads work. Was not happy about this but I was able to correct.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product and an excellent buy for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good. It is built to be tough and long lasting. It is easy to use. I would recommend this product. It made the job easy and fun to do. Are used to install ceiling tile in my Cottage. There was a lot of work to be done in this staple gun made it fast and easy to do. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Giorgetti

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Tons of power. built in safety, which is deactivated when you press the tip into the surface of your project. Put a new seat cover on my motorcycle and worked excellent.
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome T50 air stapler
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a big screen job and have already found a bunch of other uses for it. Keep in mind this is not the small crown type stapler. You would not want to put up trim with it. Nor is it very portable since it requires a compressor. But your hands will thank you if you are using the manual T50 guns. Plus this is a dang good deal with all the staples you get. Highly recommended, powerful and half the price of the yellow or blue ones.
customer_reviews.author: johno

customer_reviews.title: One stapler to rule them all.
customer_reviews.text: This pneumatic stapler rocks! Slammed through two boxes of Staples and not one mishap. So far I am pleased with the performance. I use it to staple threw wood, cardboard, plastic, fabric. The stapler takes care of business. I use this in a diy fashion and I expect it to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: The Kurgen

customer_reviews.title: Great little stapler, lots of versatility!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a tool for re-skinning a motorcycle seat, and Surebonder's 9600AK did precisely what I needed. The longer head made it easy to get into the deeper recesses of the seat pan a breeze! This will also work great for many other applications like reupholstering furniture or for tacking tar paper in roofing jobs or putting up Tyvek before siding structures. Great little tool!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Hinton

customer_reviews.title: Acts like its jammed
customer_reviews.text: It acts like its jammed. Only got through two rows of staples. I've spent more time taking it apart. Only to put it back together with out it working. When it did work it was great. Frustrating as all get out. I should have tried it when I bought it. But was nit ready with my project.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Kent

customer_reviews.title: What can I say?
customer_reviews.text: It's a pneumatic stapler. It staples. It does it well. It never jammed even when the pressure dropped to a point where it wouldn't staple -Ooops, forgot to turn on the pancake compressor. Yep, it staples. Feels good. Nice grip even with my huge paws. It staples. That's it. Easy to load. Did I mention it staples?
customer_reviews.author: Kataco

customer_reviews.title: Broke after short use with no abuse
customer_reviews.text: This stapler worked great until it died. On the fourth room of vapor barrier stapling the machine seemed to jam. On inspection there was no stuck staple or anything wrong but the stapler would not staple...it was dead!!! Light easy to use but if you want it to last it won’t!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to install some chicken wire under our deck to keep our dog from getting into the mud every time we let him out. This made the job so much easier. Tool works great and had no issues with it at all. Only disappointment is the case is pretty cheap and I doubt it will last. The oil that came in the box had also all leaked out.
customer_reviews.author: starlord

customer_reviews.title: It's a bargain and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great stapler, and a bargain at that! Recovered six dining room chairs, not one staple not fully seated, no jams, no misfires, swift on the punch. If I had a gripe, the staples were not packed well and one box opened and it broke up some of the rows. I called and got a credit on that box of staples so all is good! Very satisfied with this purchase. Humbly submitted, Moi
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality control. Body has a very razor sharp metal sticking out. Looks like from a drop and then painted over. Air hose fitting is installed unprofessional. I am able to pull it off not even attached on. Pretty green and light weight. Company does not answer phone calls.
customer_reviews.author: Steve chase

customer_reviews.title: The best stapler so far
customer_reviews.text: I have used manual staplers and battery operated staplers for years. This unit is the best so far. Every other stapler fails to put in a perfect stapler every few hits. This stapler so far has not failed once, every staple looks perfect. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: savemoney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a dozen projects so far. I should have bought this years ago. Highly recommend. Cannot find a better deal with all that's included anywhere. Would definitely buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ron B.

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: What a great stapler, used it to install carpet runners and it worked flawlessly with the longest staples you can buy. I was going to purchase a Hitachi because i like to purchase name brand tools that will last but this one based on the reviews really blew me away.
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 staples.
customer_reviews.text: Loaded it up. Turned down the PSI on the compressor so we could string up some insulation. First three staples were great. Then it jammed, and then the magazine would unlatch when you stapled, and then it refused to work. Don’t buy this. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Andy M

customer_reviews.title: Works great, good value
customer_reviews.text: I used this tool to install vapor barrier to the underside of my floor joists. Once I saw this was available I realized it would make the job much easier and it did. Performed great. Great value for what you get. Good, durable case that everything fits nicely in. Comes with the quick change male end pre-installed. A lot of air tools come without the connector installed.
customer_reviews.author: OlyNomad

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite purchases ever!
customer_reviews.text: The price is right and THIS STAPLE GUN IS EASY TO USE! I love to do art and craft projects as well as reupholster old chairs, and this lightweight gun is easy to use making hand fatigue a thing of the past. Nice product!
customer_reviews.author: Frances Ziemann

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great staple gun worked perfectly for re-attaching the seat cover on my motorcycle seat, the set pan is a thick plastic material, the supplied 1/4" staples were perfect for attaching the seat cover and the gun had plently of power to drive the staples home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent tool
customer_reviews.text: used extensively while replacing carpet on boat trailers...so far has performed flawlessly in fact far better than another that cost 4 times as much...it has done more jobs than several others that i have purchased without a single misfire or bobble....if it fell apart tomorrow i would still be a very satisfied buyer...
customer_reviews.author: rk

customer_reviews.title: unit failed after one use
customer_reviews.text: used the stapler one time for less than 50 staples oiled it stored it for 6 months in my shop pulled it out today and it will not fire the trigger is limp I would not buy this or recommend it to anyone, spend a few more $$$ and go with a name brand
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect ! I don't use one of these often, so I didn't need to spend extra for a brand name. I have used it for upholstery and installing weather barrier house wrap. Not a single jam so far....
customer_reviews.author: Giterduun

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: This stapler is great. Used it to put new carpeting on a cat perch. Comes with a nice little storage case and a ton of staples. I use tools a lot and I highly recommend this. And what about that color!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: philgleiss

customer_reviews.title: Nice staple gun
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with this staple gun. Came with case and all 5 staple sizes.. only one small issue when I first oiled it up and connected my air line for the first time it took about 30 seconds of me pushing on the trigger before staples started to come out. I guess it was new and had to loosen up. After that not one issue has been had.. love it.
customer_reviews.author: PJB

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Bought this to staple edges of carpet on stairs and tile. My old stapler had a large, flat end. This has an end that can be jammed into gaps allowing staple to be hidden.
customer_reviews.author: Dan B

customer_reviews.title: "Great Air Stapler"
customer_reviews.text: Works really great. Very happy with it. A super buy with lots of various size staple included. Just used 300 staples with out 1 Jam. I can't believe that is works that good for the price. Great Value Thanks Bob - Reno, NV
customer_reviews.author: BNP93

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: This stapler was the perfect size to staple the headliner I was replacing in my 1968 Buick. I'm very pleased with how well it worked and how easy it was to maneuver while working in tight places.
customer_reviews.author: TMC

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: It feels comfortable in hand decent grip..... but there's a little too much jam. I narrowed it down to the nails, if I put in two pieces of a card one slide over the other and causes the jam..... Manageable problem
customer_reviews.author: Carl Williams

customer_reviews.title: This is a great stapler for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stapler for the price. I have had a few jams that required me to take apart the nose piece. It was simple and fairly quick. I believe it was most likely due to the pressure being too low. have not had any issues after i ironed out the perfect pressure settings.
customer_reviews.author: TrevoR

customer_reviews.title: Simply Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Operates so quickly you have to resist using too many staples. Didn’t jam once during reupholster of two chairs. I have only a small air compressor, but had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased before doing 3 significant home improvement projects. I was very happy to have this; it worked great and was a big help. It has held up quite well through the projects.
customer_reviews.author: Pipermom

customer_reviews.title: Great stapler - highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have used this on several projects now, and am very very impressed. I have gone through 2-3 cheese-weenie electric staplers - which were all junk. Now that I have this little unit, I'm never going back!
customer_reviews.author: NM Flash

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for my needs--good price.
customer_reviews.text: This stapler works as advertised for a very reasonable price. I only need it for infrequent use: If I needed one every day, I would invest in heavier duty model, but for the few jobs I've used it, it's perfect. The case is flimsy, but I (a) only need the case as a dust cover between what are sure to be rare uses--it works just fine for that and (b) I didn't buy it for its case. So--I'm completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Donald B. Zepp

customer_reviews.title: Buy one of these
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous little tool. I absolutely love it. Used it to insulate a 2300sq ft house and it worked great. Only thing I wish it had is a belt hook. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: David Dirrim

customer_reviews.title: Great stapler
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little stapler. We used it to recover some chairs in our dinning room. Its easy to load, light weight and uses many different sizes of staples.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Effortless stapling.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Doesn't take any effort to use. My hands couldn't take the hand stapler anymore so I bought this and it is so easy to use. I reupholster small projects and its perfect for these type of projects. The price was right so I bought it. I have a small air compressor to use with it. So far so very good!
customer_reviews.author: GED

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Air Stapler
customer_reviews.text: Such an awesome product and shockingly inexpensive. I stapled down underlayment for a 20 x 20 carpet with this thing and it took about 5 minutes. Would've taken me a half hour or longer with a hand stapler.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Failed during first project
customer_reviews.text: Failed after one project. The driver/striker failed to return into position when I was 90% done with a garage insulation job. No jam just an internal issue.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald R. Berry Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This gun worked like a charm. I purchased it to refelt my pool table and it did its job perfectly. The price if quite fair and the amount of staples it comes with are a huge bonus. Aside of receiving a green colored gun, it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it I put 15000 staples through it attaching insulation webbing to studs. Got the job done. It's not "fully automatic", but you can hold the trigger and bump the nose of it on the stud in quick succession and will fire at every "bump".
customer_reviews.author: Mika

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and worked perfectly. Used with my pancake compressor to rescreen my porch. Worked way better than expected. And the different staples were so helpful and used for screen and trim.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Fordyce

customer_reviews.title: Must have for ATV seat covers
customer_reviews.text: Recovered the seat on my quad and it would not have been possible with out this stapler. I tried a regular HD hand stapler. Not a chance you can’t make it though the seat plastic with that. This worked like a champ!
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a staple gun to do my dirt bike seat cover and this one works perfect! The head of it is small enough to get into tighter area's so this one is awesome! Plus all the extra sizes of staples you get in the pack is nice too! Highly recommend for anyone using it for anything! My dad borrows it from me almost weekly so it gets used quite a bit, haven't had any problems with it!
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: pleased so far
customer_reviews.text: arrived quickly... puts staples all the way in where my electric one wouldn't. pleased so far. nice to have all the sizes of staples come with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Nice bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: good price, worked well, not bulky, nice case and assortment of staples included. cant lose.
customer_reviews.author: K. WALKER

customer_reviews.title: so glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.text: Was using a manual stapler, got tired of jams and staples not going in This is like cutting warm butter with a hot knife Worked great and came with a ton of staples great product and value Wish I had purchased years ago
customer_reviews.author: Cavalier Gator

customer_reviews.title: I want my money back this is junk with a air hose
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolute piece of junk I want my money back you cant run around to different spots to staple. The air hose is a pain in the butt. I went out and bought a battery operated one and it is the best thing in the world. So I dont know if there is a way to get my money back it is still brand new cause I refuse to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: Love it. So far I used it to install seat covers on my golf cart. Worked great. Never missed a beat. Should have bought one years ago. Now I am looking for more things to staple.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this little gun is awesome. I have used a whole box of staples so far. Not a single misfire, double fire or jam. Works much better than electric. Air pressure didn’t seem critical.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Used it with 3/8" staples for 6 mil plastic, and used 9 /16" staples with 1 /4" mesh hardware cloth. Works great. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Ruckus

customer_reviews.title: Nice stapled
customer_reviews.text: Excellent staple gun, I found that I needed to use 120 psi instead of the rated 100 psi to get the gun to function properly.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This product work great! Did my first boat with it and all was just perfect. Hopefully it continues to perform well which I believe it will.
customer_reviews.author: L. Sandling

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I had to build 14 large wooden screens so I needed to put in a large amount of staples. The gun worked very well. I put in over a thousand staples and I never had one jam.
customer_reviews.author: Charles wells

customer_reviews.title: Dollar for dollar great buy
customer_reviews.text: Just insulated a 20 x 20 garage with bats. Worked great only one jam. Includes stables, connection the whole deal. Why pay more.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: We used this stapler to reupholster our boat seats. Using 9/16 staples through vinyl and into plywood was no problem for this thing.
customer_reviews.author: RehabGuy

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Just finished a project that used ~3,000 staples. Had only one jam, when I first started using it. It is nice and light and easy to use. The included staples by themselves are worth the purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice stapler
customer_reviews.text: Love this stapler works perfectly bought this to do an ATV seat cover worked great no jams and staples were all flush and it comes with a bunch of staples at a great price
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stapler!
customer_reviews.text: This is very VERY well made stapler. It has a slim profile and grip which makes it easy to handle. Way easier than using a manual T50. I have been using it to staple cordura fabric to a thick plastic backing using 5/16" staples. It has plenty of power. The depth of the staple can easily be adjusted by simply turning the regulator setting on your compressor. I also like the fact that it uses a common T50 type staple which you can buy at any hardware store. I am very pleased with this purchase and highly recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just right for the job.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking around for a good stapler and gave this a try. Works better than I expected. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Nothing fancy but works great
customer_reviews.text: Great price for this. We're using it to staple upholstery fabric on some dining chairs. Does a nice job even through multiple layers. WEAR EYE PROTECTION!
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Great pneumatic stapler
customer_reviews.text: Easy to operate because it is so light. I used a manual stapler until I purchased. It comes in a nice storage case.
customer_reviews.author: Idaho kid

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The nose could be snot longer though. That said, it worked fine except for a tight corner of two.
customer_reviews.author: Dr E

customer_reviews.title: Excellent upholstery projects/ Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This stapler is very lightweight and easy to use. I upholstered 4 dining room chairs and the stapler did not jam on me at all. This is a great value for your bucks and takes different size staples which is a plus if you are looking to work on different upholstery projects that require a deeper staples.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary P

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price, easy to use. Works well on my T50 Stainless steel staples. Makes your staple job easy and fast.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Makes it possible for me to do it myself. Manual stapler I don't have the strength.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Crane

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Used this to put up a vapor barrier on some OSB. Used it for some other small projects also. Works great, no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: ease of use
customer_reviews.text: works great used on roof to put felt on shot through plastic caps to hold felt on worked great
customer_reviews.author: william Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great tool...
customer_reviews.text: This tool saved me time and my hands from a lot of aching work. Worked great. Nice little tool.
customer_reviews.author: ARDave556

customer_reviews.title: Good tool and low air consumption.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little stapler. Low air consumption and no jams after running a couple thousand staples through it. At this point, I'm still just breaking it in. I haven't used anything longer than 1/2" yet, but it has no problem with embedment and I haven't had to go over 80psi even in knotty wood.
customer_reviews.author: Rob S.

product_meta.title: Surebonder 9600AK Pneumatic Heavy Duty Standard T-50 Type Stapler Kit, 1/4-Inch - 9/16-Inch, 7-Piece
product_meta.description: Size:1/4-Inch - 9/16-InchPlease note this tool needs an air compressor to operate. An air compressor does not come with the tool/kit. This user friendly and lightweight air powered stapler is a must for the DIY homeowner. You will be able to finish your projects or repairs in half the time and have fun doing it. In this kit you will receive 1250 staples of each different length: 1/4", 5/16", 3/8", 1/2" And 9/16". These are Surebonder #4 standard size heavy duty staples, same as Arrow T50 type staples. The kit also includes a high impact carrying case, An allen wrench, small bottle of tool oil and easy to follow operating instructions. The applications are endless-here are a few; upholstery, insulation, screen repair, woodworking projects, fencing repairs. Standard features include: safety mechanism that prevents accidental firing, an adjustable Air exhaust, a rubber cushioned handle for comfort, A Quick release magazine for easy staple loading, staple viewer and 1/4" Quick release connector. (Air compressor needed but not included). Use an air hose that will withstand at least 150 psi, OR 150% of the maximum pressure of the compressor. Never connect this tool to compressed air if the pressure could exceed 200 psi, as the stapler could burst.
feature_bullets: Air compressor is needed to operate tool - Does Not Come With Tool
Kit: carrying case, 6250 staples in 5 different lengths, Allen wrench, bottle of tool oil, Staple gun & Operating instructions
Applications: cabinet backs, carpet padding, screen door repair, small furniture projects
Our customer service department is available for troubleshooting
